content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "get_hyperlinks" command to search for rental companies and lodging options near Naeroyfjord for kayaking, but it returned too much output. I then used the "execute_shell" command to curl search for the same information and used the "browse_website" command to gather information from the Google search results. I saved a list of rental companies and lodging options to a file named "rental_lodging_options.txt", but later deleted it. I used the "google" command to search for the best kayaking routes in Norway and used the "browse_website" command to gather information on the top 10 kayaking routes recommended by Eirik Verås Larsen, which I saved to a file named "top_kayaking_routes.txt".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "top_kayaking_routes.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: The top 10 kayaking routes in Norway recommended by Eirik Verås Larsen are:
1. Lofoten Islands
2. Helgeland
3. Geirangerfjord
4. Jotunheimen
5. Aurlandsfjord
6. Rondane National Park
7. Sognefjord
8. Voss
9. Hardangerfjord
10. Telemark Canal

Paddling code for safety:
- Always wear a life jacket
- Never paddle alone
- Bring a map and compass
- Be prepared for changing weather conditions

For more information and tips, visit https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/outdoor-activities/canoeing-kayaking/top-places-to-paddle/', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best kayaking routes in Sweden"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.routesnorth.com/sweden/things-to-do-in-sweden/the-best-kayak-and-canoe-tours-in-sweden/", "https://visitsweden.com/what-to-do/nature-outdoors/canoeing-and-kayaking/canoeing-kayaking/", "https://www.wikiloc.com/trails/kayaking-canoeing/sweden", "https://outdoorfitnesssociety.com/adventure/places-to-kayak-and-canoe-scandinavia/", "https://scandification.com/kayak-in-sweden-kayaking-in-sweden/", "https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attractions-g189806-Activities-c61-t191-Sweden.html", "https://misfitwanders.com/canoeing-sweden/", "https://www.traveltomtom.net/destinations/europe/sweden/self-guided-canoe-trip-in-sweden"]', type='action_result')]
"""
